title: Textile, "Le Marchand d'orvietan (The quack doctor)", ca. 1785
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 182.5 x 93 cm (5 ft. 11 7/8 in. x 36 5/8 in.)
description: One and a half repeats of scenes of a quack doctor selling medicine to villagers. In red on white
